sen.j: 麩屋町通（ふやちょうどおり）は京都市内の南北の通りの一つ。
sen.e: Fuyacho-dori Street is one of streets in Kyoto City running in the north-south direction.
Fuyacho-dori Street is one of streets in Kyoto City running in the north-south direction.
Fuyacho-dori Street is one of streets in Kyoto City running in the north-south direction.

sen.j: 北は丸太町通から南は五条通まで。
sen.e: It stretches from Marutamachi-dori Street to the north to Gojo-dori Street to the south.
It stretches from Marutamachi-dori Street to the north to Gojo-dori Street to the south.
It stretches from Marutamachi-dori Street to the north to Gojo-dori Street to the south.

sen.j: 平安京の富小路にあたるが、現在の富小路通は麩屋町通の一本西の通りを指す。
sen.e: The street was called Tominokoji in the Heian-kyo days. Today, the name Tominokoji is used for the street one block to the west of Fuyacho-dori Street.
The street was called Tominokoji Street in Heian-kyo, however, the name Tominokoji Street is used for the street one block to the west of Fuyacho-dori Street today.
sen.cmt: Tomikoji Streetに訂正しました。分割は不要と考え、一文に訂正しました。
sen.e: The street was called Tominokoji Street in Heian-kyo, however, the name Tominokoji Street is used for the street one block to the west of Fuyacho-dori Street today.

sen.j: なぜこのように名前が変わったか、理由は不明である。
sen.e: The reason for the name change is unknown.
The reason for the name change is unknown.
The reason for the name change is unknown.
